title: Can You Handle The Blessing? | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Can You Handle The Blessing? | Joel Osteen
description:
If you want to experience new levels of favor, you have to show God you can handle everything that comes with the blessing. On the other side of the persecution is favor greater than any you’ve seen in your life. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
